name: Air Battle Commander
description:
Air Battle Commander

A basic SHMUP by JBV (a.k.a Once) made from 19/08/2022 to 16/09/2022 for the "Basic Shmup Showcase" Jam organized by Krystman.

How to play:
  • [Arrow keys] to move
  • [Z] (button 1, square) to shoot
  • [X] (button 2, cross) to restart on the gameover/victory screen
  • Kill 10 enemies to move to the next wave
Features:
  • 10 levels
  • 2 difficulty modes (you will be prompted to choose after each death)
  • procedurally generated background (sea+islands) and foreground (dynamic clouds)
  • 6 types of enemies with different behaviours and multiple attack phases
Design decisions:
  • first few waves teach you how enemies move and attack
  • player is weak but nimble, it is sometimes better to avoid enemies and wait for an opening
  • continuous shooting is not possible, your gun will overheat, take a break
  • enemies don't stop and wait to be shot at, they will try to fly past you and come back later
  • when hurt, look at the clouds, some will help you regain health points
